sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CITBPKMS( PKMS_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4) ,PKMS_COME_CODE VARCHAR(4) ,PKMS_TABL_ID VARCHAR(50) ,PKMS_SORT_NUMB NUMBER ,PKMS_TABL_NAME VARCHAR(100) ,PKMS_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(20) ,PKMS_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) ,PKMS_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(20) ,PKMS_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'PKMS_CORP_CODE', '법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'PKMS_COME_CODE', '공법' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'PKMS_TABL_ID', 'TABLE ID' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'PKMS_SORT_NUMB', '순서' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'PKMS_TABL_NAME', 'TABLE 명' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'PKMS_UPDT_DATE', '수정일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'PKMS_UPDT_CMAN', '수정자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'PKMS_INIT_DATE', '등록일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'PKMS_INIT_CMAN', '등록자' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02

WITH T1 ( PKMS_CORP_CODE ,PKMS_COME_CODE ,PKMS_TABL_ID ,PKMS_SORT_NUMB ,PKMS_TABL_NAME ,PKMS_UPDT_DATE ,PKMS_UPDT_CMAN ,PKMS_INIT_DATE ,PKMS_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1' ,'ALL0' ,'CATBCMPK', 0 ,'CA-자동공법공용콤보' , '20221027' ,'GE001037', '20140901', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1' ,'PCBD' ,'CATBPCBM', 1 ,'PCB 재료비정보' , '20180702' ,'SYSTEM' , '20180702', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1' ,'PCBD' ,'CATBPCBP', 2 ,'PCB 가공비정보' , '20180702' ,'SYSTEM' , '20180702', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1' ,'PCBD' ,'CATBPCBC', 3 ,'PCB 원판당 적용수량' , '20180702' ,'SYSTEM' , '20180702', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1' ,'BRAZ' ,'CATBBRAM', 1 ,'BRAZING 재료비정보' , '20171214' ,'SYSTEM' , '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1' ,'BRAZ' ,'CATBBRAP', 2 ,'BRAZING 가공비정보' , '20171214' ,'SYSTEM' , '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'MALC', 'CMTBMALM', 234, 'AL중력주조 재료비' , '20200421', 'SYSTEM' , '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'MALC', 'CMTBMALP', 235, 'AL중력주조 가공비정보', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' , '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKMS_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKMS_UPDT_DATE > D.PKMS_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TABLES B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKMS_TABL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKMS_TABL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKMS D ON D.PKMS_CORP_CODE = A.PKMS_CORP_CODE AND D.PKMS_COME_CODE = A.PKMS_COME_CODE AND D.PKMS_TABL_ID = A.PKMS_TABL_ID
